scriptLines: AggPurchaseAmount derive(CustomerSegment = iif(TotalSpend > 5000, 'High Spender', iif(TotalSpend >= 1000, 'Medium Spender', 'Low Spender'))) ~> AddSegmentt

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TableName,isnull(max(WatermarkValue),'2010-01-01 00:00:00.000') as lastruntime from watermarktable
where TableName='orders'
group by TableName

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from Orders 
WHERE CreatedDate BETWEEN CAST('@{activity('lastupdate').output.firstRow.lastruntime}' as DATETIME) and cast('@{activity('current').output.firstRow.currenttime}' as DATETIME)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TableName,isnull(WatermarkValue,'2010-01-01 00:00:00.000') as lastruntime,getdate() as currentTime from watermarktable
where TableName='orders file'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from @{item().TableName}
where CreatedDate between cast('@{activity('lastupdate').output.firstRow.lastruntime}' as DATETIME) and cast('@{activity('current').output.firstRow.currenttime}' as DATETIME)

select TableName,isnull(max(WatermarkValue),'2010-01-01 00:00:00.000') as lastruntime from watermarktable
where TableName='@{item().Tablename}'
group by TableName
